Name: Rohit Sharma
Teams: India, Deccan Chargers, India A, India Green, India U19, Mumbai, Mumbai Indians, Indians, India Blue, Board Presidents XI
Bio: For a large part of his career,it seemed Rohit Sharma's biggest gift was his biggest burden,all shots in his armoury,Sharma emerged from Mumbai's suburbs as the heir apparent to the batting greats of the 2000s,Ironically his IPL franchise nicknamed him "Hitman" when he was anything but: more caresser
